spec_data.Name: rubygem-puppet-lint
spec_data.Description:
Checks your Puppet manifests against the Puppetlabs
style guide and alerts you to any discrepancies.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 24 Feb 2017 02:06:43 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ensure your Puppet manifests conform with the Puppetlabs style guide
